attributes.action: Hold a referendum on whether Britain should leave the EU
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is clear that Britain has very little say in the decision making process of the EU and that we are increasingly losing much of our national identity and traditions to European federalism. 

As the EU grows ever larger and more costly (increasing our tax burden to pay for all the additional red tape) I believe the benefits of membership are now significantly outweighed for the great majority of British citizens.

Consequently, we need to flag up to the government that we want to leave the EU and take control of our own political and economic destiny.
